1.title: Willow's Lament
1.plot: Despite her best efforts, our karmically-challenged hero and owner of Yoga Town, Willow, is facing financial ruin. The karma plate isn't cutting it and her daughter, Amber, knows it.

2.title: Elijah Enters House of Love
2.plot: Elijah's charm is his persuasion and Chas attempts to explain his love connection.

3.title: Male Bonding
3.plot: Elijah seems to talk his way out of anything as Willow, and daughter, Amber, learn that life is not for the feint of heart.

4.title: Crisis Management
4.plot: Elijah sets up camp. Willows tries to come up with ideas to get rid of him and win back her clients. Chas takes every opportunity as a love connection.

5.title: T.L.C. Tandoori Loving Care
5.plot: Neela comes to the rescue, bringing in a little ethnic chic. All that is needed is a bit of 'Tandoori Loving Care'.

6.title: Amber Flies
6.plot: Amber gets in touch with her feelings and is drawn into Elijah's circle of love as Chas looks in disbelief and Willow fears the worst.

7.title: Tantric Love
7.plot: An obsessed Amber shares some tender moments, and tantric toes, with Elijah as Chas attempts the same, with less resolve.

8.title: Kidnapped
8.plot: Neela and Willow join forces to find Amber as dutiful Chas is left out in the cold.

9.title: Sarah and the Yogasm
9.plot: With Amber 'kidnapped' by Elijah, Willow and Neela's hunt leads them to an unusual location. Noticing the 'Go Yoga' truck at an upscale house, they uncover a few shocking surprises.

10.title: A Good Indian
10.plot: Neela thinks the celebrity factor is brilliant and vows to do the same at the studio. With Elijah parked in his spot, getting any celebrity in the doors of Yoga Town proves difficult at best, as bhangra class begins.

11.title: What Just Happened?
11.plot: Things are looking grim for Willow, when Chas kindly offers a new plan. Will Willow lose the only person that believes in her?

12.title: Burning Desire
12.plot: Willow has come to a crossroad. Alluring Elijah offers her one final opportunity to save herself, and her studio. Will she be tempted by the sweetness of sacrifice?

imdb.plot outline: Have you had your Karmic Slap today? YOGA TOWN is a mockumentary comedy about a group of employees, led by a single mom and her teenage daughter, who run a financially struggling yoga studio. When a mobile yoga company, 'Go Yoga', parks in their neighborhood, the ante is raised and the earthy Yoga Town owner, Willow, is forced to go to battle with Elijah, the Prairie-born pied piper of yoga. With the yoga movement becoming the 'religion of choice' for the urban chic, Yoga Town, has become the 'church of choice'. Just like any 'movement', the followers give the leaders 'hero status', as if they are impermeable to imperfections. The reality is that these characters are anything, but perfect. And, the competition is fierce.

Episode 9 - SARAH AND THE YOGASM With Amber kidnapped by Elijah, Willow and Neela are on the hunt to find her. Noticing the 'Go Yoga' truck at an upscale house, they uncover a few shocking surprises, including the beautiful Sarah McLachlan!::Jill Hope Johnson
synopsis: Have you had your karmic slap today?YOGA TOWN is a mockumentary comedy about a group of employees, led by a single mom and her teenage daughter, who run a financially struggling yoga studio. When a mobile yoga company, Go Yoga, parks in their neighborhood, the ante is raised and the earthy Yoga Town owner, Willow, is forced to go to battle with Elijah, the Prairie-born pied piper of yoga. With the yoga movement becoming the religion of choice for the urban chic, Yoga Town, has become the church of choice. Just like any movement, the followers give the leaders hero status, as if they are impermeable to imperfections. The reality is that these characters are anything, but perfect. And, the competition is fierce. The idea of following a path towards enlightenment is the farthest thing from this World, although everyone is on the road to YOGA TOWN.I
